scripts.deploy: arkb deploy aos/process/process.wasm -w $WALLET --use-bundler https://up.arweave.net --tag-name Data-Protocol --tag-value ao --tag-name Variant --tag-value ao.TN.1 --tag-name Type --tag-name Module --tag-name Module-Format --tag-value wasm32-unknown-emscripten2 --tag-name Input-Encoding --tag-value JSON-1 --tag-name Output-Encoding JSON-1 --tag-name Content-Type --tag-value application/wasm --tag-name Memory-Limit --tag-value 500-mb --tag-name Compute-Limit --tag-value 9000000000000
